item.title: Koranna words with |xam and English translations
item.summary: Koranna-Hottentot Words, with their Bushman and English translations from ≠kásin (B XXV. 2365-2373, 2375-2413; L IV.-1. 3482-3484) This includes parts of the body, plants, numerals and details of the uses of bushes named.
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book IV-1
item.author: ≠kasin (Klaas Katkop) (IV)
